_header: O heavenly star so clear and bright
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, A hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains (aaab) with alternating refrains: ‘Salue sancta parens’ and ‘Omni labe carens’, which are joined in the burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
O heuenly sterre so clere and brightIn whome did light the sonne so
                    right…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …Nature mankynde fre forto makeOmni labe carens
